items.title: Three-front war, one new lever
items.text: AI raised expectations, collapsed channels, and attacked value props; trust became the new playbook.

items.title: Trust-based acquisition replaces broken channels
items.text: SEO, SEM, and corporate social weakened; employees, creators, community, and product experience drove word of mouth.

items.title: Trust-based retention becomes the moat
items.text: AI commoditized efficiency and cost; customers stayed for teams that shipped, listened, and earned trust.
